content: I have a question about an issue I'm having with LLVM that's not directly related to rustc. It is, however, related to a rust crate (llvm-sys). I'm guessing this isn't the right place to ask, but could you point me to somewhere where people might be familiar with LLVM's C API and/or this crate?

Hey there @Camelid! There's an official LLVM discord (https://discord.gg/xS7Z362) and a discussion forum (https://llvm.discourse.group/). If you're using a specific Rust wrapper like inkwell or llvm-ir, that project may have its own discussion platform. If you DM me though, I might be able to help as I have some experience with LLVM right now :smile:
I believe there's also an IRC, but I don't know exactly where that is.
